page.title: 17Religion in Kingswood area
page.content: There are two{Church of England Churches in the area. St.Andrew's, Kingswood; and The Church of the Wisdom of God, Lower Kingswood. Both are looked after by one{vicar}who lives in the Kingswood Warren housing estate. He is responsible for the pastoral care of people living in the majority of our area. Attendance at {Sunday services}is quite good for the population of the area, especially in wealthy Kingswood - where three services are held each Sunday. Church life is quite healthy with many Church-based groupes meeting regularly. These include Mother's Union, St. Andrew's Prayer Group, Cubs, Scouts, Brownies, and Guides. The area also comes under the {Roman Catholic parish}of Tadworth and there is a{Free Church chapel}in Lower Kingswood.
